PackageOracle.name: DA_EVENT_RELATED
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_EVENT_RELATED
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.53.642778000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,event_id IN NUMBER
,related_event_id IN NUMBER
,event_related_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,event_id IN NUMBER
,related_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_event_related;

body.name: DA_EVENT_RELATED
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_EVENT_RELATED
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.53.652206000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,event_id IN NUMBER
,related_event_id IN NUMBER
,event_related_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_event_related.add, parms=' || event_id || '|' || related_event_id || '|' || event_related_reason_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_event_related a
(
a.event_id
,a.related_event_id
,a.event_related_reason_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.event_id
,add.related_event_id
,add.event_related_reason_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_event_related.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,event_id IN NUMBER
,related_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_event_related.del, parms=' || event_id || '|' || related_event_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_event_related a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.event_id = del.event_id
AND a.related_event_id = del.related_event_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_event_related.del');

END del;

END da_event_related;
